description.zh-CN: 禁用Apple MCE报告，修复AMD系统内核崩溃

description.zh-HK: 禁用Apple MCE報告，修復AMD系統核心當機
description.ja: 無効化s Apple MCE reporter to fix kernel panics on AMD システムs.
description.ko: 비활성화s Apple MCE reporter to fix kernel panics on AMD 시스템s.

description.en: Disables Apple MCE reporter to fix kernel panics on AMD systems.
